page.title: 13Health.
page.content: Doctors. There are two doctors that visit the village. Dr. B. Clarke and Dr. J. Lang. The new main surgery is at Milton Abbas, here they also run a country dispensary, the staffs names are Mrs. A. Dawe (nurse) Mrs. V. Herridge (dispenser) Mrs. C. Oddie (secretary). People collect their prescriptions from this surgery. There is a delivery of medicines to the village shop in Milborne. The doctors attend a surgery in Milborne three times a week, Monday morning, Wednesday evening, and Thursday morning. They see the patients in a small building specially built in the I960's. The Health Visitor uses the building once a month for a baby clinic.
